Sentencas: The perovskite oxide La0.8Ca0.2CrO3 was studied for application as a direct methane oxidation anode in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) using temperature-programmed (TP) techniques.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA0.8CA0.2CRO3 IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: Activity for methane oxidation, redox behaviour, methane adsorption and extent of deactivation by carbon deposits for the oxide were compared with those for the conventional anode material, Ni-ZrO2 cermet, studied previously.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA0.8CA0.2CRO3 IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: The Ni-ZrO2 exhibited a much higher activity for the formation of carbon deposits than the oxide.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA0.8CA0.2CRO3 IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: Furthermore, the temperature of onset of carbon deposition was much lower on the cermet than on the oxide.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA0.8CA0.2CRO3 IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: Over the oxide, two main methane reaction regimes were identified: complete oxidation at intermediate temperatures (over the pre-oxidised catalyst only) and methane dissociation at high temperatures.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA0.8CA0.2CRO3 IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: Each reaction took place via two mechanisms.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA0.8CA0.2CRO3 IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: Complete oxidation involved reaction with either surface or absorbed oxygen species.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA0.8CA0.2CRO3 IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: Methane dissociation appeared to occur via catalysed (probably at oxygen ion vacancies) and uncatalysed mechanisms.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA0.8CA0.2CRO3 IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: At approximately 400-600 degrees C, where complete oxidation of methane occurred over the oxide, no carbon deposition was detected.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA0.8CA0.2CRO3 IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: This is in contrast with Ni-ZrO2 where carbon deposition was observed over the entire active temperature range of the catalyst.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA0.8CA0.2CRO3 IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: This suggested that a methane direct oxidation SOFC with such an oxide anode material may be operated at these temperatures without becoming deactivated by carbon deposits.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA0.8CA0.2CRO3 IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES

Sentencas: The effect of the addition of water to the methane feed was studied and was seen to substantially reduce the amount of carbon deposition.
Titulo: ACTIVITY AND DEACTIVATION OF LA0.8CA0.2CRO3 IN DRY METHANE USING TEMPERATURE-PROGRAMMED TECHNIQUES
